freenet.node
Class NodeStats

java.lang.Object
  freenet.node.NodeStats
All Implemented Interfaces:
Persistable
public class NodeStats
extends Object
implements Persistable

Node (as opposed to NodeClientCore) level statistics. Includes shouldRejectRequest(), but not limited to stuff required to implement that.

Field Detail

DEFAULT_SUB_MAX_PING_TIME

public static final long DEFAULT_SUB_MAX_PING_TIME
Sub-max ping time. If ping is greater than this, we reject some requests.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

DEFAULT_MAX_PING_TIME

public static final long DEFAULT_MAX_PING_TIME
Maximum overall average ping time. If ping is greater than this, we reject all requests.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

MAX_THROTTLE_DELAY

public static final long MAX_THROTTLE_DELAY
Maximum throttled packet delay. If the throttled packet delay is greater than this, reject all packets.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

SUB_MAX_THROTTLE_DELAY

public static final long SUB_MAX_THROTTLE_DELAY
If the throttled packet delay is less than this, reject no packets; if it's between the two, reject some packets.

See Also:
Constant Field Values
